title: WRC.6.FIA.WORLD.RALLY.CHAMPIONSHIP-STEAMPUNKS
description:
P R O U D L Y P R E S E N T

WRC 6 FIA WORLD RALLY CHAMPIONSHIP

Type: RACING Packager: STP
Publisher: BIGBEN Cracker: STP
Supplier: STEAM/STP Release Date: 06/2017
Steam Link: http://store.steampowered.com/app/458770/WRC_6_FIA_World_Rally_Championship/

RELEASE NOTES

STEAMPUNKS are proud to bring you WRC 6 release including a real Denuvo license generator with untouched game executable
Your license will be regenerated if needed
Enjoy The Power We just gave you

To add some technical details to our keygen:
You Do NOT Need steam installed
You can play Offline
Steam Path will be automatically detected or created
Your license will be re generated on any hardware or software change

On a race track, the car makes all the difference. In a rally it's the driver.Fog, mud, punctures...you have to deal with it all
WRC 6 includes all of the official 2016 content, 11 Super Special Stages on a 1:1 scale

Game includes latest updates
Game is multi language (change within the game)
English French Italian German Spanish Polish

INSTALLATION:
1.Unpack, burn or mount iso
2.Install the game
You will have the option to copy the crack files automatically
3.Start the game by launching our Keygenerator from
the desktop shortcut we created or you can manually start
the game running stp-wrc6.exe
4.That's it, Enjoy the Game

If you didnt choose the option to copy the crack automatically just copy the content of STEAMPUNKS on the ISO to your installed
game folder
